member.name: T:Abp.AutoMapper.AbpAutoMapperConfigurationExtensions
member.summary: Defines extension methods to to allow to configure Abp.AutoMapper module.

member.name: M:Abp.AutoMapper.AutoMapExtensions.MapTo``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Converts an object to another using AutoMapper library. Creates a new object of . There must be a mapping between objects before calling this method.

member.name: M:Abp.AutoMapper.AutoMapExtensions.MapTo``2(``0,``1)
member.summary: Execute a mapping from the source object to the existing destination object There must be a mapping between objects before calling this method.
